item.title: Textmate setup (Mac only)
item.description: Sometimes students are interested in this setup, which is what I’ll document here. Though I want to highlight that you can get a very similar setup using other tools. Note that this setup only works for Mac computers. and under bundle, choose the R bundle as shown below. As you can see, it hasn’t been updated in a while…
